question: Who was appointed as the acting Chief Justice of the Karnataka High Court in 2019 after the elevation of the then incumbent Chief Justice Dinesh Maheshwari to the Supreme Court?
explanation: On 17th January 2019, the President of India Shri Ramnath Kovind under Article 223 of the Constitution of India appointed Lingappa Narayana SwamyÂ as the acting Chief Justice of the Karnataka High Court in 2019 after the elevation of the incumbent Chief Justice Dinesh Maheshwari to the Supreme Court.
